column1: Bayan Palace (Arabic: قصر بيان‎ Qaṣr Bayān) is the main palace of the Emir of Kuwait. It is located in the Bayan area.

Bayan Palace was opened in 1986 to host the fifth conference of the Arab League. The palace also has an international conference centre attached. There is also a 0.35 hectare Emiri tent within the palace grounds
column2: which was erected in 1991 after the liberation of Kuwait.
